papers.title: Why DNA?
papers.abstract: A small collection of general facts related to DNA is presented

papers.title: On Reidys and Stadler's metrics for RNA secondary structures
papers.abstract: We compute explicitly several abstract metrics for RNA secondary structures defined by Reidys and Stadler.

papers.title: Stochastic S-I-S-O-E Epidemic Model
papers.abstract: An stochastic SIS epidemic model in an open environment is presented.

papers.title: A model of memory, learning and recognition
papers.abstract: We propose a simple model of recognition, short-term memory, long-term memory and learning.

papers.title: A Bit-String Model for Biological Aging
papers.abstract: We present a simple model for biological aging. We studied it through computer simulations and we have found this model to reflect some features of real populations.

papers.title: Efficient Monte Carlo Simulation of Biological Aging
papers.abstract: A bit-string model of biological life-histories is parallelized, with hundreds of millions of individuals. It gives the desired drastic decay of survival probabilities with increasing age for 32 age intervals.
